meanings.definition: A device used for fastening papers together by driving a thin metal staple through them.
meanings.sent1: I used the staplers to attach my homework sheets together.
meanings.sent2: The office supply store sells various types of staplers.
meanings.sent3: The staplers on my desk seem to have a mind of their own, always ready to help me organize.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as mental staplers, holding his attention firmly in place.
meanings.sent5: The staplers clicked rhythmically, creating a satisfying sound as they secured the documents.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that staples.
meanings.sent1: The staplers in the office work diligently to keep the papers in order.
meanings.sent2: She is the fastest staplers in the department, always finishing her tasks on time.
meanings.sent3: The staplers at the event were the unsung heroes, quietly ensuring everything stayed organized.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was like a staplers, binding the group together with joy.
meanings.sent5: The old staplers in the library had seen countless pages come and go, a silent witness to knowledge shared.
